eu_initiatives: Currently, CEIA is closely following the European Commission 's public policies on fake news and online disinformation.
organisation_name: Chamber of Excellence in International Affairs (CEIA)
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
relevant_communication:
Since its beginning in 2016, CEIA has developed an ongoing journalistic project, Global News Intelligence (newsint.ro), which is a Romanian media platform that strives to give forth topics from international politics by providing news, analysis, info graphics, policy briefs, interviews and online broadcasts. 
 
Therewith, on 29th September 2016, CEIA held in the Romanian Parliament an international debate, “Does Romania have a coherent strategy in Moldova?”, meant to bring together experts to discuss the future of the Moldovan-Romanian relations. 
 
On 27th March 2017, CEIA  has launched an online platform for countering misinformation and anti-west propaganda from Romania and Republic of Moldova - checkmedia.ro (CheckMedia).
